title: Jitendex.org [2024-06-02]
author: Stephen Kraus
description:
Jitendex is updated with new content every week. Visit Jitendex.org to get the latest version.

You can support Jitendex and my contributions to free language learning. Visit https://www.patreon.com/jitendex

Many thanks to all of my supporters.

•epistularum
